issue.title: Small contradiction in n2723 to forward to committee

discussion.p: I ran across a small contradiction in working draft n2723.

blockquote.p: p2: A forward_list satisfies all of the requirements of a container (table 90), except that the size() member function is not provided.
p57: Complexity: At most size() + x.size() - 1 comparisons.

discussion.p: Presumably p57 needs to be rephrased to not use size(), or note that it is used there only for sake of notational convenience.

blockquote.p: We agree with the proposed resolution.

p.i: Change , forward_list operations, paragraph 19, merge complexity as indicated:

blockquote.p: Complexity: At most size() + x.size() distance(begin(), end()) + distance(x.begin(), x.end()) - 1 comparisons.
